parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description: The name of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoNamespaceName
parameters.description: The name of the namespace to which the image repository belongs.

parameters.name: RepoType
parameters.description:
The type of the repository. Valid values:

*   `PUBLIC`: The repository is a public repository.
*   `PRIVATE`: The repository is a private repository.

parameters.name: TagImmutability
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the feature of image tag immutability. Valid values:

*   `true`: enables the feature of image tag immutability.
*   `false`: disables the feature of image tag immutability.
